name: City Sniper to Kill
description:
City Sniper to Kill

The People who love to play an Action games,City Sniper to kill is best game for them,the city is full of Antisocial elements,be a good citizen and kill all.This game includes the bunch of different weapons like snipers,shot guns and also includes different locations.choose your location and your favourite weapon and go for it.To Play This game Tilt Your Device,Then Aim your shoot and fire.headshot can increase your points.

Key Features City Sniper To Kill Game

-> Different types of weapons

-> Multiple options to choose a locations

-> Tilt Functionality

-> Easy Controlling

-> Dynamic Game

-> User Friendly game
